model_answer: The correct timeline is: (2) A panoramic mountain scene shows the text "BIGMANOVERLAND" as electronic music returns. This event starts the video, setting the scene. This event follows the assembly of the chair and provides context for the other items he brings. (5) He invites viewers to subscribe, calling himself a "big man" with a family. This event comes last, providing a call-to-action for viewers to follow him on his trips. Therefore, the correct order is: 2 -> 4 -> 1 -> 5 -> 3 -> 6. The answer is (B).
